display_help: You are caught with the Master Shadow's Death Shroud and are exposed to the cold of the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. Your life is being drained.
display_target_help: You are caught with the Master Shadow's Death Shroud and are exposed to the cold of the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. Your life is being drained.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
